statements: DELETE FROM TravelTimePrediction WHERE id = 1 AND predicted_time < 30;
DELETE FROM TravelTimePrediction WHERE predicted_time >= 45 OR (id = 2 AND traffic_info LIKE '%heavy%');
DELETE FROM gps_data WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -70.0;
DELETE FROM traffic_info WHERE congestion_level >= 5 AND road_name LIKE '%Highway%';
DELETE FROM travel_time_predictions WHERE route_id = 100 AND predicted_time > 60;
DELETE FROM traffic_information WHERE road_name = 'Highway A' AND traffic_speed > 60;
DELETE FROM travel_time_prediction WHERE origin = 'New York' AND destination = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 100 AND selected_route = 'Route A';
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 101 AND selected_route = 'A1';
